location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from George Lucas, Muskat [Muscat] to Lewis Pelly, Political Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter regarding Lucas' arrival in Muskat [Muscat] and updating Pelly on affairs there including Sayed Toweinee's [Thuwaini bin Said] success in driving the Wahabees [Wahhabi] out of Soor [Sur].The letter also reports on Hajee Ahmed, the Muscat Vezeeer, who is interested in purchasing the schooner Georgiana.
